health_drain.name: Health Drain
health_drain.description: Gradually decreases the target's health over time.

health_regeneration.name: Health Regeneration
health_regeneration.description: Gradually restores the target's health over time.

health_steal.name: Health Steal
health_steal.description: Steals health from the target and adds it to the caster.

stamina_drain.name: Stamina Drain
stamina_drain.description: Gradually decreases the target's stamina over time.

stamina_regeneration.name: Stamina Regeneration
stamina_regeneration.description: Gradually restores the target's stamina over time.

stamina_steal.name: Stamina Steal
stamina_steal.description: Steals stamina from the target and adds it to the caster.

magic_drain.name: Magic Drain
magic_drain.description: Gradually decreases the target's magic over time.

magic_regeneration.name: Magic Regeneration
magic_regeneration.description: Gradually restores the target's magic over time.

magic_steal.name: Magic Steal
magic_steal.description: Steals magic from the target and adds it to the caster.

fire_damage.name: Fire Damage
fire_damage.description: Inflicts fire damage on the target, either instantly or over time.

frost_damage.name: Frost Damage
frost_damage.description: Inflicts frost damage on the target, either instantly or over time.

shock_damage.name: Shock Damage
shock_damage.description: Inflicts shock damage on the target, either instantly or over time.

poison.name: Poison
poison.description: Gradually inflicts damage over time as a poison effect.
